subject: fix: add loading fallback and error recovery for black screen issue
body:
Users could see a black screen if React failed to mount, crashed during
render, or the loading spinner was too subtle. Three layers of defense:
1. HTML-level loading indicator visible before JS loads
2. Top-level RootErrorBoundary catches any React crash
3. Improved spinner with text label for visibility
